name: Tanthious
description: Rise from nothing, Discover the secrets your ancestors left behind. Forge yourself into the perfect weapon to survive the 7 demon lords and their armies. An Epic Journey awaits, every time you leave town!

name: Push Comes to Shovel
description: Push Comes to Shovel is a snowy sim-adventure set in the frigid town of Windrow. Become the Blizzard Wizard you've inspired to be and clean up the town. Upgrade and utilize a variety of plows, snowblowers, shovels and tools to complete chill jobs.

name: Saloon Simulator
description: An abandoned Saloon is waiting for you to restore its former glory. Find out that managing a saloon isn't just about creating drinks and meals. Clean up, organize, and choose the right friends - all to become the most recognizable business in the Wild West!

name: Lewis & Clark Expedition
description: Lewis & Clark Expedition is a Strategy game with elements of RPG. As a Corps of Discovery leader, you'll conduct the expedition throughout the unexplored interior of North America with the goal of finding a convenient passage from the Missouri River up to the Pacific Ocean.

name: Jurassic Lab: Dinosarium DNA
description: Become a Jurassic explorer in the laboratory of the future. Assemble a dinosaur skeleton from bones that were found, create your own dino collection, breathe life into dinosaurs and you can see them in nature just like thousands of years ago. The future life of dinosaurs is in your hands.

name: Epoch of Love
description: "Epoch Of Love" is a unique hentai novel with lots of hot girls! Here you can feel like a hero of different events and eras! You will get incredible pleasure from the game and its gameplay!

name: Draconis Volatus
description: SHMUP with more tactics and some RPG Elements. Flying dragons and advance a quest to save the world.

name: The Milk Lake
description: Alone, Emmer traverses strange and dangerous lands to avenge her family and kill the dragon who burnt her home to the ground. But monsters aren't always the scary things that lurk in the shadows. The Milk Lake is an intense, atmospheric sword-combat action RPG about the true nature of evil.

name: On my own: A Hot Isekai Adventure
description: A powerful ritual made all the men in a village disappear. When a powerful witch tries to bring them back, she ends up making a mistake and an unexpected man is summoned. Will he be able to survive in an unknown world full of beautiful women and full of dangers?

name: XSpeed
description: X-Speed Racing is an unreal engine based multiplayer racing game taking place in 10 legendary race tracks around the world.

name: Uncatchable Homers Master
description: With action and fun together, use the ball and several weapons to destroy enemies. Enjoy the feeling that you are in a real war mission with amazing 3D sound effects and human voices. One hundred levels and more. 25 Powerups and 10 major weapons that made this game a unique close to realism. Enjoy.

name: Supreme OS
description: Supreme OS is an operating system that runs on your operating system. With such stupendously amazing features as agile mail servers, exciting terminal commands, puzzles for your puzzles and the occasional AI singularity, Supreme OS is bound to be a game-changer!

name: Drift Go
description: Drift Go is Multiplayer and Singleplayer Drift Simulation and Driving Game.

name: Lifeway
description: Lifeway is a 2D punishing platformer game in which the protagonist moves in eccentric ways. Have a taste of bittersweet joy by rolling your body through obstacles representing troubles and defeats in one's life, till the end of the journey.

name: Forbidden Ninja Scroll: Kunoichi Training
description: Forbidden Ninja Scroll is a Kunoichi (Female Ninja) adventure & simulation game in development. Compatible in VR and non-VR. This is an early prototype of the game.

name: US United: Co-Op Deckbuilder
description: US United is a rogue-lite coop deck-building game where heroes need to work as a team to win!

name: The Many Misfortunes of Kyran Pierre Cadenza the First
description: Set within a satirical take on the traditional fantasy setting, The Many Misfortunes of Kyran Pierre Cadenza the First, sees the player assume the role of a failed bard as he recounts a tale of past adventure in a blend of ‘choose your own adventure’ style storytelling and grid-based combat.

name: IndividuaLand
description: Turn based combat strategy game with town management. 16 different Jungian personality types. Teach skills to characters, attract new visitors, improve profession skills, go on adventurers, craft items, fight with more than 100 monsters in 6 different type adventure areas.

name: Exodus Idle
description: Exodus Idle is an idle game in which you fight monsters, hunt, construct buildings, loot and upgrade equipment. As you progress, follow along with the built-in novelisation and journey into the dark world beyond The Sereid.

name: Heroes of Arcana
description: Heroes of Arcana is a turn-based roguelike with RPG elements in which a team of heroes embark on a quest to reclaim their future. Their journey takes them through four different dungeons with increasingly difficult challenges and powerful treasure.

name: Unanimy
description: A synchronized-movement puzzle game that just keeps getting more complicated.

name: Dance Hime: Rhythm Matching
description: “Dance Hime: Rhythm Matching” is a VR game that combines match-3 with music and dance. It focuses on match-3 and girls' hot dance. In addition to the sense of achievement after a successful match-3, players can also enjoy the immersive dance of elven girls.

name: The Wanderer: Chosen One
description: The Wanderer: Chosen One is an epic fantasy 2.5D action platformer about bretrayal and justice. Explore different kingdoms, battle againts the fallen guardians and restore order all by yourself. Forge your destiny and follow the path of the ancient magic bestowed on you... The Chosen One.

name: Shiny-Man-Adventures
description: Shiny-Man-Adventures is a 2D-Platformer Shooter in which you are playing the Shiny Man character... You have been missing for many years but now your time has come to shine again.

name: Rogue Princess
description: Being the princess of a big kingdom is soooo frustrating! Live the exciting battle fantasy of the Rogue Princess, wield an array of procedurally generated weapons, explore exotic levels, battle vicious enemies, and get upgrades to help the Princess end this endless party night in harmony.

name: Russian Pawn Store
description: Take on the role of a Soviet pawnshop owner! Buy a variety of goods in your boutique and sell them at auction. Find used equipment in the junkyard or find interesting items in neighboring blocks of flats. Trade and get rich! Enjoy the nightclub scene, fight the competition and show who's boss!

name: The Majestic
description: An intimate tale of two sisters & their tenuous bond. Soar above the clouds, discover hidden wonders, and rally against Darkness. Delve through time, experiencing beauty, mystery and triumph in this cozy narrative woven with love, friendship, and family.

name: Robo50
description: Robo50 is a fast-paced arcade-style shooter. Equip the mechanised Robo50 body armour and administer excessive force to eliminate the criminal scourge and clean up the streets. Destroy gang hideouts and weapon stores, track down the criminal kingpin’s lair and unleash an armoury of enhanced weapons.

name: The Green Light
description: The Green Light is a single-player first-person mystery set in 1986. A story driven game with an atmospheric environment and narrations. A tale of self-discovery as Gary Baker attempts to save what's left of himself and his family.

name: Stinky Company Simulator
description: In Stinky Company Simulator you play as the owner of a company dealing with the collection and disposal of waste. Earn money by completing new jobs. Grow your business by buying new tools and vehicles. Also, beware of competition that will not hesitate to use mafia-like methods if the need arises.

name: Chromahertz
description: Chromahertz is a boss rush bullet hell game about drawing with your body. Lead yourself around through hazards and enemies leaving rainbows of destruction in your wake. Be careful where you stop!

name: Rob & Run
description: Rob & Run is an action shooter in which you need to inflict as much damage as possible to the PHOENIX Corporation, which has seized power in the city. Use different weapons, abilities and gadgets against your enemies.

name: MagiCarnage
description: Once every 1000 years, the gods materialize themselves into the mortal plane and battle one another in order to see who's truly the god of gods. Cast powerful spells and shatter your opponents, in MagiCarnage!

name: Protozoa
description: Protect the asteroid mine's reactor from swarms of supersized alien protozoa. This game's groundbreaking AI system uses machine learning to adapt to your strategy in real-time as you build and upgrade your defenses. Fight evolution itself.

name: The Girlfriend From My Novel
description: I was an obscure professional writer. A heroine of my work appeared in front of my house and asked to move in with me?! With her insistence, my ordinary, unchanging life began to change... But why did she appear? How long could this life full of unanswered questions last?

name: Crow's Cry
description: A puzzle horror game where you can grab ANY object to solve puzzles! Explore and find secrets to expose the truth. Hide from, run from, & outsmart monsters that stands in your way!

name: Legacy 1917
description: Legacy 1917 is a stealth action game set during Russian revolution. Fight your way back home through the collapsed empire.

name: Gossamer Matrix
description: A retro-inspired FPS about good business practices with an emphasis on equipment interaction.

name: Pickle Frickle
description: You are but a pickle, determined to become the first non-human president of the United States of America. You stop at nothing to achieve this goal.

name: Natural Disasters
description: Is an indie Survival Top-down game in which the player needs to escape from natural disasters such as an erupting volcano, tornado, tsunami, etc. Each disaster is represented by a level in the game and you must do whatever it takes to survive. How many disasters can you handle?

name: Necrophobia
description: This is a real time fantasy rpg with different ways to play! You can be a spell casting wizard or you can be a sword and shield warrior! Tons of updates to come and I am excited to see what happens!

name: Hero Mania
description: Hero Mania is a bombastic, comic-book themed multiplayer party game where players don the spandex of unfamed, super-powered heroes as they brawl their way to the top using their abilities, wits, and even each other!

name: Enworden
description: Enworden is a word game where you make words from random tiles. The game gets more difficult as you play, use your cunning and intelligence to stay one step ahead! Special powers will also give you an extra edge. Compete with your friends by sharing the level seed!

name: Nihmory
description: Nihmory: is a single player, action-adventure game that follows Eiya as she uncovers the mysteries of the world of Nihmory. Taking place in an era hundred of years after the fall of technology, Eiya must regain their lost history in order to help - or destroy - all of Nihmory as they know it.

name: Sealer of Dungeons
description: Sealer of Dungeons is an action-shooter with Rogue-lite elements. Play Sealers on their journey, you will find great treasures and abilities to seal the unknown evil above. Gather precious loot, discover hidden secrets, and chat with merchants to get powerful items. Seal the dungeon, save the world!

name: Team Manager
description: Become the coach and manager of your team and lead your football club to international success. A fast and easy to learn football manager for experts and beginners.

name: DeckBuilder Village
description: DeckBuilder Village is a deck-village builder where you play your cards to fight, explore, survive, defend and expand your village. Fight creatures, collect resources, build structures, explore dungeons, unlock secrets, craft and much more!

name: Neko Slime Souls
description: "Neko Slime Souls" is a fast-paced action-adventure game that includes Roguelike elements.This game has a smooth and refreshing battle system. You can use different weapon magic together. Continue to explore, fight, and defeat powerful enemies in the maze...

name: E-On
description: Log In to the near future metaverse platform E-On. Explore and connect with Ellie as you break the bounds of your unverified account and uncover the truth of the world and Ellie.

name: Notmads
description: Command a powerful beast as a mage in an open-world action RPG and build your customised fortress on its back. Defend it by learning and casting magic spells and team up with friends to experience this fantasy world together.

name: Crane Logistics Simulator
description: Crane Logistics Simulator, Grow your logistics network!

name: Gamma Nocturne 1
description: Gamma Nocturne 1 is a 1-4 player online co-op horror game. A research mission on a newly discovered earth-like planet has failed. You and your crew must stop the members of the new race from reaching Earth. How could you know that this frozen alien would come to life when thawed?

name: County Hospital 2
description: Paranormal Horror! Using just a handycam go inside a very dark abandoned hospital, the nightvision will help you to see, explore the place and face all kinds of brutal entities in a creepy inmersive enviroment *Mission: Find a fuse to return the power and then destroy the place by setting it on fire

name: The Old Ones
description: The Old Ones is an action-adventure game about the mysterious disappearance of old civilizations and it's relation to greater beings, it takes you to amazing places filled with well-designed puzzles, creatures to fight, ancient ruins to explore and much more surprises waiting for your discovery!

name: Oh Shit Boulder
description: Oh Shit Boulder is a action runner game that involves the treasure hunter Ray to seek out the valuable cursed idol that is deep in the jungle. Play as the Treasure Hunter as he journeys to get the cursed idols and must way his way back to sell the idol.

name: Liam's Journey
description: Find young Liam's way home while exploring a mysterious cave full of danger in this pixel art action platformer. Pull your way out using your grappling hook, meet unique characters and overcome hundreds of hand crafted challenges to decide Liam's fate

name: Peace for Ukraine
description: Military shooter about Ukrainian / Russia crisis 2022

name: Wizcave
description: Take on the role of a magician and explore the mystery of underground caves. Fight monsters and try to recover the artifact from these caves, use your staff to summon spells. The road will not be restless, you will encounter many obstacles and enemies during your journey.

name: Fly to hope
description: Fly to hope is a platformer action game. Use your shotgun and machete to overcome enemies. Fight with strong bosses and collect your 3 missing part of your aircraft.

name: Red Chaos: The Strict Order
description: Red Chaos is a classic and modern real time strategy game. Red Chaos offers a variety of strategic aspects based on the strengths and weaknesses of individual units and ensures continuous equality of opportunity through a sophisticated balancing system.

name: No Body
description: No Body is a story driven, turn-based-action RPG hybrid (sort of) in the present day. With puzzles. Inspired by UNDERTALE, Silent Hill, and a Night In The Woods, four teens and their robot friend must escape the bizarre and dangerous reality they find themselves trapped in.

name: MetaShooter
description: MetaShooter is a real-world simulation-based FPS hunting game.

name: Soul Riders
description: Go fast, take to the skies or just engage in some good ol' vehicular combat. There's something for everyone! Enjoy a variety of game modes all centered around chaotic multiplayer fun with unique power-ups and a vehicle that plays however you want it to!

name: Glaciered
description: Glaciered is an action-adventure indie game that takes place on a glacier-covered Earth 65 million years in the future. Play as a Tuai, a species evolved from birds, to soar through the seas and fight against the threats to this new golden age of life.

name: There is Still Hope
description: There is Still Hope is a single-player, adventurous, story-rich, and mystery game. You play as the character, Michael. His wife goes missing while working, and it's your job to find her. The game includes tasks, conversations, and wilderness, but more importantly, an unforgettable story.

name: Magnetic Projectiles
description: Aim and shoot magnetic projectiles at your objective!

name: The Dancer: Definitive Edition
description: Run from the most terrifying monster the world has ever seen - royalty free music.

name: The Silk Road of the Eastern Dynasty
description: Experience the perfect combination of tower defense and the historical plot of the Silk Road, so as to bring an amazing epic game adventure experience! You will follow our protagonists in a strategic battle on the Eurasian continent! Come on, buddy, this epic fantasy adventure needs your help!

name: Dagger of heroes
description: Dagger of heroes - Are you able to resist the forces of evil? That captured the peaceful outskirts and destroy their inhabitants. Try your luck and find out what awaits you on the battlefield? Or will you put up with it and take it for granted?

name: The First Backrooms
description: The First Backrooms is a first-person survival horror game in which you journey alone through the mysterious halls of the backrooms.

name: Reign and Ruin
description: Survive in a brutal medieval world. Reign and Ruin is a multiplayer survival game, in which you must weather the harsh elements, gather resources, establish a settlement, defend your home, dominate your enemies, and rise up alone or with your guild to become the king of the realm.

name: Outbreak: Shades of Horror
description: Multiplayer co-op survival horror returns in this early 2000s-inspired, undead apocalyptic nightmare. Kill or be killed, then rise from the dead and kill your friends!

name: Rusl
description: Rusl is a pixel RPG game, where the main character named Russel tries to escape from the virtual reality back to his own. The game is filled with entertaining elements such as PvE fights, inventory system, and a lot more.

name: PegSoli+
description: "PegSoli+" is a game based on the rules of the classic board game Peg Solitaire (or Solo Noble), with some modifications.

name: Mr.Egg: Adventure
description: This is a side-scrolling game with pixel art, the main character is Mr.EGG, you can brandish your sword and throw the egg shell to defeat the enemy on the way, you can also change your appearance with coins in the shop.

name: Computer Club
description: Computer Club is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will be told the story of two sexy lesbians who work in a computer club. But instead of work, they decided to have hot sex! The game is filled with sex scenes, humor and romance.

name: Tower Fall
description: Tower Fall is a fun PC alternative to the board game known as "falling tower".

name: Rotten Apple: New York Fallen
description: Since the outbreak, New York has been turned into an isolated quarantine zone. You and your squad are just on the way to guard the quarantine zone border when an unexpected emergency call forces you to enter. Those who enter the quarantine zone rarely return. Can you and your team survive?

name: The Parasites
description: You are one of those who managed to survive after the fall of a giant meteorite. Build, explore, survive, upgrade your character by fighting against parasites that have invaded the earth. And then you may be able to hold out for some more time.

name: Spellscribe
description: Spellscribe is a typing fantasy RPG where you'll have to use every spell, word, and strategy in your arsenal to win. Explore dark dungeons, barter with friendly owls, and fight deadly monsters, all on your journey to save the world.

name: Virium
description: Navigate and explore the twisted organic world with the ability to walk on anything! Climb large creatures, solve puzzles, unlock different forms and abilities, and uncover secrets in this atmospheric Puzzle-Metroidvania.

name: Postapo Mechanic Simulator
description: The world is over. But racing never stops! Become a mechanic and repair cars in your garage at the top of a ruined skyscraper. Create parts from scrap, install upgrades, and assemble vehicles that will go on a race through wrecked buildings and massive ramps suspended above a radioactive wasteland!

name: Doodle Champs
description: Doodle Champs is the ultimate experience for artists and doodlers alike! Play an exciting assortment of doodle-tastic party games with endless replayability, or just draw on a shared online canvas with your pals!

name: Parallax
description: Parallax is an Online Tennis game where you become the best by mastering precise controls and working as a team. Cool down after casual or intense competitive matches by exploring a lively lobby together with your friends!

name: Unaki
description: Explore a tropical island, befriend adventurers and fight cunning monsters in free-flowing combat. Upgrade your gear and power up with creative gem synergies. Unravel the island's dark truth by hunting down its hidden secrets

name: Humans Are Useless
description: A gang of nine aliens from another galaxy that were put to community service, want to clean the universe from what they think is the worst garbage: humans! Help them in this arcade game!

name: Idle Factory
description: Idle can also build your industrial empire.

name: Escape from Ever After
description: When a greedy megacorp with the power to enter storybooks takes over Flynt Buckler’s fairytale world, he must get a job to sabotage them from within! Climb the corporate ladder, fight in stylish, snappy combat, and dive into storybook worlds from Lovecraft to sci-fi in this genre-bending RPG!

name: Tower of Osiris
description: A high octane, Voxelized Dungeon Crawler where you must use your wits and parkour skills in order to advance up the floors. Kill all enemies in your way. Whats waiting for you at the top?

name: Potion Tales
description: Potion Tales is a potion brewing game, in which the potions you brew decide the fate of your customers. Make yourself a home in a cozy potion kitchen and prepare different potions for the unique problems of your customers.

name: Guns Undarkness
description: This is a "stealth RPG" from Shoji Meguro, known as the composer and director of the "Persona" and "Shin Megami Tensei" series. In a devastated world after a nuclear war, you become a member of the PMC (Private Military Company) and carry out missions with your peers.

name: Indecent Desires
description: “Indecent Desires” is a very adult +18 intrigue/drama interactive game in the mould of something like the TV-series “Dallas” or “Dynasty”, with a bit of “Beverly Hills 902010” thrown into the mix (“Indecent Desires” really does feel and look like the naughty +18 lewd version of those TV-series).

name: Rosetia: A First Contact Simulation
description: Become the first diplomat to an alien world in this dialogue-driven, Star Trek-inspired RPG. Explore an ancient civilization, befriend its strange inhabitants, and make agonizing choices that will forever shape the future of their species.

name: Ocular Deprivation
description: Ocular Deprivation is a top-down horror game where you, the player, are blind. The only way for you to find your bearing is through the use of echo-location, and observing how the sound bounces off the walls. Be careful though, for you aren't the only one using sound to their advantage

name: Sumo Seals
description: Sumo Seals is an arcade party game that supports up to 4 players where you and your friends team up or compete against each other in a series of minigames where you control seals that bounce and stomp their way through skill and reflex based challenges.

name: Trailer Tales
description: A charming story-based puzzle game that replicates the soothing and satisfying challenges of camping in bite-sized isometric spaces. As you meet and walk in the shoes of other campers, you discover more about yourself in relation to others and the world around you.

name: TSA: Thieves Strike Again
description: TSA: Thieves Strike Again is a strategic FPS team-based game that has 5 maps and 7 game modes ready to be played.

name: Spaceteam: The Second Dimension
description: A chaotic, cooperative party game! Shout technobabble at your friends until your spaceship inevitably explodes. Attempt to follow randomly generated, incorrectly assigned instructions. Work together… as a Spaceteam!

name: Forlorn: The mysteries of Highshadowland
description: It is a first-person atmospheric horror game with riddles and puzzles, haunting ghosts and dreadful monsters to fight with. You’ll be playing as a detective Edward Forlorn who is investigating mysterious events that happened in the orphanage in Highshadowland.

name: Rev to Vertex
description: Rev to Vertex (R2V) Immerse yourself in the virtual racing ground. Explore the vibrant hills and shimming metropolis of Hong Kong. Customize your car and drift in style. Realistic driving physics and battle system. Defeat rivals and race your way to the top.

name: Nude Crisis
description: Nude Crisis is a Stealth Puzzle game. Hina is an office worker who finds her clothes missing after showering at work. Now she must make it home safely without being seen.

name: The Outer Radius
description: Lead a caravan of survivors through a world on the brink of collapse. Scavenge for resources, form bonds with your fellow survivors, and make difficult choices in this turn-based strategy roguelite. Will you survive long enough to reach the Outer Radius?

name: Storage Hunters
description: Are you interested in making money? Afraid of losing your money in such a risky field? No more risks! In this game you can try yourself in this business, go for it! Become the king of business and take yours!

name: Troubled Passage
description: Troubled Passage is a Roguelike ARPG with an engaging combat system based on mouse swipes. The mouse is an extension of your sword. Fight your way through randomly generated levels, recruit companions, gather loot, trade, forge weapons and learn new skills!

name: Ezra's Legacy
description: Ezra's Legacy is an action packed 2d platformer game inspired in classics from the 80s, with 8-bit aesthetics, great soundtrack and awesome gameplay. If you want something new and exciting, but at the same time pay homage to the classics, then Ezra's Legacy is for you!

name: The Little Cuttle Goes to Battle
description: The Little Cuttle Goes To Battle is 1-Bit 2D Shooter with seed based level generation from handmade chunks (250+ unique chunks in game). To help your scientist friends who are working to solve the problem of marine pollution you need to defeat the megacorporation and its army of robots.

name: Lootonomicon
description: Lootonomicon is a rogue-lite action-RPG. Solo, or with a friend, collect loot to satiate the hunger of the Lootonomicon.

name: Final Fright
description: Halloween gets deadly in this action-packed love letter to retro side-scrolling beat ‘em ups. Bring the smackdown as a squad in co-op mode (up to 4 players) and jam out to a spooky, fist-pumping soundtrack inspired by the finest arcade beat ‘em ups of the ‘90s.

name: Spacebase Siege
description: Third person shooter with strategy elements.

name: Lord of Fire & Ice
description: Become a powerful Wizard and defend your realm from invading monsters! Cast spells of fire and ice from your magic staffs using hand gestures. Be careful to use the opposite element in battle, as creatures can gain strength from their own element. Good Luck young Mage! Your people need you!

name: Rog n' Mon
description: rog N' mon mixes two big genres, Creature Capturing and Roguelike. Every time you play you will be placed in a procedurally generated level where you'll need to defeat 8 Gym Masters. To do that, you will need to enrich your team by capturing new monsters and training them to get stronger.

name: Dungeons of the Amber Griffin
description: Play as a group of daredevils who explore the world of dark fantasy in search of fame, amber and gold. Experience the classic mechanics of the iconic ‘90s Dungeon Crawlers with a new twist. Solve the mystery of the ghost that haunted the ruins and discover a bestiary based on Kashubian beliefs.

name: Lands of Ryuu
description: Lands of Ryuu is a tower defense game that brings strategy and exploration together. Defend your homeland against waves of enemies using totems, spells and other manifestations of your power.

name: Lucille: The balance of light and dark
description: Welcome to the continent of Coleritt, this is a 2D action rogue game. As Lucille continues to grow, the secrets of light and darkness will be revealed!

name: Pigglet in Mrs. Big Bad Werewolf
description: Pigglet would do anything for a free meal. Even entering a restaurant full of tasty monster girls! Fight, flirt, adventure and puzzle your way into their hearts... and beyond! ;) Nom nom! A NSFW rpg adventure with a tried-and-tested one-handed control scheme!

name: Final Vanguard
description: Pilot a last push to reclaim your star system and save everything. Final Vanguard combines shoot 'em up mechanics with RPG and Rougelite elements plus a touch of strategy to offer a unique in-depth 3rd person shooting experience.

name: Fast-Ball
description: Roll your balls through majestic and mysterious lands. Race the clock, solve puzzles, soak in the vistas. Upgrade your balls to make them faster, sleeker, and more responsive to the controls.

name: Superzgun
description: Superzgun is a 2D survival horror game set in a post-apocalyptic world claimed by the undead.Shoot your way through waves of swarming zeds and upgrade your gear to outlast the Horde.

name: Gaz
description: Gaz is a boomer shooter heavily inspired by the pioneers of the FPS genre, such as Doom or Duke Nukem. Dive into dirty, post-communist Poland and fight for your survival. If you think you can save the world, you're already dead.

name: Polygon Pursuit
description: Dodge, shoot, survive! Polygon pursuit is an arcade-style twin stick shooter where you are pursued by multiple enemies constantly. You play as a lone circle confined in a polygonal world fighting to survive against waves of unique enemies. This is not an easy game.

name: Debugger Recoded
description: The Developer messed it up, his games are full of errors and bugs and nobody will buy it! Take control of Debugger 3.16 and find and delete all bugs the Developer produced. Explore with up to 3 friends different game worlds, meet the inhabitants and bring their games back to life!

name: Senpai and the Mysterious Dungeon
description: To save the kidnapped senpai and also the beloved one, Fulla decides to challenge the dungeon on the island inhabited by demons. This is a traditional 2D roguelike RPG. Every time you enter the dungeon, the layout will change! Use various skills and equipment to save your senpai!!

name: My Last Night Here
description: You were Kidnapped by a crazy serial-killer in the middle of nowhere, can you find your way out? through the escape the player will find terrifying facts about the unknown killer and will find himself deeper and deeper in the trap...

name: Leaving the formation
description: Leaving the formation is a story-driven sci-fi combat simulation based on honest Newtonian flight physics.

name: Yahtzee VR
description: If you think Yahtzee is just a game, l am afraid you are very much mistaken. At a party of such fun and revelry, few rounds of dice game with your friends seems the natural thing to do for bonding relationships. Set up rules and team up to defeat your opponents. May the best prevail!

name: KaBoom!
description: Pew Pew Pew, KaBOOM! is a challenging old school arcade game filled with action! Unlock new costumes and enjoy the awesome Chiptune OST as you reach new highscores!

name: Nekomancer: Seeded by Darkness
description: The Nekomancer is an Adult Adventure Zelda like game, You play as "Avery" a Femboy Catboy Nekomancer, a user of magic with Lustful properties! In this top down Pixel art style game, you choose to eliminate or seduced the enemies you encounter during your epic Quest!

name: Space Ark
description: Commander, your help is required in order to save the existence from extinction, join the adventure in solo arcade mode or in multiplayer. ------------- Destroy your friends in epic spaceship battles and steal their points in order to enhance & personalize your own ship once you return to your base.

name: Planet Theta
description: Sin descripción

name: Isletopia
description: Isletopia is a relaxing strategy game of greenifying barren islands. Use plants as your building blocks and optimize their placement in different biomes to make them teeming with life once again!

name: Hellist
description: HELLIST is an isekai rogue-like indie game based in Heaven and Hell. It's in early development, click "Request Access" to instantly begin play testing and give feedback!

name: Slam Dome
description: Slam Dome is a co-op action roguelike that revels in the era of badly translated arcade games and television. Equip yourself with insane weapons and gear to try to survive this top down online multiplayer experience. "Hey guys! Are you ready to slam?"

name: Halberd Black
description: A sci-fi turn-based JRPG game with a rich story and a diverse cast of characters!

name: Dwarf Prison
description: Fight to escape this chaos-covered ancient prison. As a dwarf, choose your weapons and spells to face your enemies in this rogue-lite platformer with RPG mechanics about a fantastic medieval mythology.

name: Secret of Sardinia
description: Swim through a desolate underwater world to discover the truth of your lost civilization. As the last sardine in Sardinia, you must translate ancient fragments, listen to the voices of the dead, and rebuild a forgotten mythology as you uncover the deepest secrets of the sea.

name: Gun & Buckler
description: Sin descripción

name: Tristan Cole's Pro Driver
description: TCPD is a combo based stunt driving game inspired by classic racing & extreme sports titles. Complete objectives while drifting, grinding, and performing insane aerial stunts in your ride to show off your style & prove you're the best driver on the street!

name: Sou'wester Winds
description: Build your own airship using the extensive shipbuilder and take it with you to explore the open world. Go hunt the beasts that live within the dark clouds, upgrade the automation on your ship or progress further in the questlines, alone or together with your friends.

name: Driftmaster
description: A fixed-angle, top-down, arcade drift racer. Race through different cities and gymkhanas throughout Canada to develop mastery over your drift. Your mightiest opponent...is yourself

name: Quack Island
description: You wake up on a sandy beach; no memory, no supplies and no way home. But you’re not the only one. Somehow, a crew of sentient ducks have found themselves stranded here. And you’re going to have to work together with your new feathered friends, if you ever hope to escape - Quack Island!

name: Mt. Aki
description: A procedural downhill-snowboarding game

name: Escape from MLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Grimstar: Welcome to the savage planet
description: Sin descripción

name: Sinbad
description: Sinbad is a 3D sandbox platfomer inspired by A Thousand and One Arabian Nights and games such as Super Mario and A Hat in Time, taking place in the magical and mysterious world of the magic lamp.

name: Chrono Weaver
description: Looking to test your brain and body in VR? In Chrono Weaver, think and throw your way through time bending kinetic puzzles. As you explore an unearthly sci-fi world, work with copies of yourself as you travel through time to find solutions to seemingly impossible tests.

name: Onar
description: When the great Oridian bell is struck a secret and deadly martial arts tournament begins on the red planet of Onar, one that changes the fate of the galaxy.

name: Missing: The Complete Saga
description: Open-world role-playing game set in the rural Indian countryside. You take the journey of an impoverished but brave village girl, Devi in her fight against her nefarious circumstances and finding her own place in the world thereafter.

name: Liquidation
description: Sin descripción

name: Rocklen
description: Rocklen is an MMORPG which immerses you in a dynamic world where you'll discover the ancient secrets and hidden unknowns of magic. You choose your path, whether it's hero, villain, wand maker, potions master (and more!): all leading to unleashing your inner arcane potential.

name: Space Station Designer
description: Space Station Designer is a construction and management game that puts you in charge of creating and expanding a network of orbital outposts in Earth and Lunar orbits.

name: Konduktor
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungems
description: Jump into this tactical tower defence! Defend your dungeon from an adaptive AI that'll respond and react to the dungeon you create. Trap up your treasures, make mobs and magic, and defend your dungeon!

name: Dye Hard
description: A heroic sheep dyes its wool to blend in and infiltrate's a cooperation run by goblins. These goblins have taken copyright law too far and must be stopped!

name: Dystopians
description: A cyberpunk colony simulator where you take over, manage & build bases, create & lead the crew to survive in a dark cybercity. Every member of the society makes their own decisions based on various factors and stats, for you is to decide and point out what would be best to do next!

name: Eden Universe
description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a god? This game will definitely answer that question. In Eden Universe, you play the role of a god tasked with leading his people to victory and glory. Start your own religion and use divine powers to rule the universe of Eden.

name: Egg Hop
description: Use eggs to hop your way through the temple to make your way to the treasure.

name: Zefyr: A Thief's Melody
description: In a colorful archipelago, play as Eïko, a young thief studying at the Guild. Investigate kidnappings, steer clear of roaming pirates or fight them. Sail the ocean on a cute turtle and climb every island. Cure sick animals, and find the truth during this feel-good journey.

name: Elemental Warriors
description: Super adventure arena for local party.

name: Elevator 500
description: A point and click walking simulator, your only way to move around will be your hook.

name: Disc Golf Online
description: Play Disc Golf online with friends in a casual, but physically accurate Disc Golf simulation. Explore beautiful and diverse procedurally generated worlds. Play a new course every time, or replay your favourite course to master it.

name: Dive Hard Dave
description: Dive Hard Dave is an atmospheric action-adventure stealth game, set in a post-apocalyptic world shattered by massive tsunami and rise in sea levels. You play as Dave, a deep-sea diver who is forced into an unexpected adventure that will unravel mysteries of Earth's past. Made by a Solo Dev!

name: Dimensional Drift
description: Race through 4 unique dimensions in a ton of different cars with arcade-style driving. Unleash your inner racer as you explore these beautiful worlds. Upgrade your cars, paint them, make them monster trucks. Put on your seat belt, lets do this.

name: Dimakerus
description: Unleash your true power by facing highly intelligent enemies and fierce beasts, from the blazing sands of Egypt to the most marvelous capitals of Rome. Explore the ancient world as you unravel the mysteries behind the fall of the Western Roman Empire in a rich plot inspired by historical facts.

name: Dictator: Glory Fatherland
description: Assume the role of the ruler of the Republic of Beetrootopia, which is in a state of civil war between 9 cities that want to become the capital. You have to not only arm your army and seize the territories of the separatists, but also solve the problems of your citizens who come to bow to you.

name: Deus Novum
description: Deus Novum is the god game you've been waiting for. Cast miracles with the power of your villager's prayer, train your creature to behave or misbehave, build elaborate villages, and fight back against the forces of evil.

name: Cat Seeker
description: Hide and seek with cats! Find and catch the kittens. Each kitten has different tricks up their sleeve.

name: Champion Battlegrounds
description: Champion Battlegrounds is a multiplayer Battle Royale game with unique low-poly anime graphics and a strategic combat system that allows you to play how you like. Choose one of an always growing set of champions and enter the battleground to be the last champion standing!

name: C.H.A.O.S.
description: The game is an VR railshooter based on the classic arcade railshooter with some VR features.

name: Catboy Crazy
description: Catboy Crazy is a cute randomly generated action RPG shooter with rogue-like elements, as you guide an adorable feline friend out of the depths of Hell.

name: Cannibals
description: A family of cannibals is killing people in the local forestry. Together with the police, you are heading there to stop the bloody atrocities...

name: Candy Sweet
description: Candy Sweet is a simple colorful match 3 game. Your goal is to move the elements on the field in such a way that three or more identical candies fall into one row

name: Campsite Simulator
description: With Campsite Simulator, you can build your dream campsite. Set up a cafe at the campsite, buy tents, and focus on growing by serving customers!

name: Bubbleland
description: Fight tactical turn-based battles in the cartoonish world full of whimsical creatures. Wisely positioning your heroes on a hex grid and combining their unique abilities is the key to victory and obtaining the precious bubbles.

name: Bumpstick
description: Bounce and bump in this fresh take on the platformer genre, control your neon stick as it bounces through tricky platforming challenges!

name: Bunker Builder: Atlantic Wall
description: Build Atlantic Wall fortifications, battle bunkers and train your troops to be counter the invasion. Become the key player in the war machine of the Third Reich and prove your worth before Inspector General Erwin Rommel.

name: Bunny-Hop
description: Forget about Speedlimits! BUNNY-HOP is a skill-based 3D-Platformer. Hop through the levels with imense speed, overcome dynamic obstacles or just enjoy the view. Every parkour has its own unique style and complexity.

name: Burning Skies
description: 'Son, you are the last hope of the resistance to free the mankind from the claws of the General BLODMESTER and his terrible War Machines.'BURNING SKIES is a frantic roguelite vertical shmup, with huge boss fights, tons of threats, weapons and a unique atmosphere.

name: Casa De Diamantes
description: Accompany agent Steph, right hand of the revered forbidden flower, on the hunt for their final rival residing in the beautiful and glamorous casino, the Casa De Diamantes.

name: Cardbuster
description: Collect and use the power of countless cards in a mysterious post apocalyptic town in this action-adventure-deckbuilder game.

name: The Blood of Yamin
description: Blood of Yamin is a stylish metroidvania RPG where you can forge your own playstyle. Powered by the essence of a dead god, explore a gorgeous 2D world on the cusp of the industrial revolution, conquer powerful foes, and confront the unknown horrors lurking beneath the surface.

name: Blood Scheme
description: A blood test company raised more than US$700 million from venture capitalists and private investors, resulting in a $10 billion valuation at its peak. You are the only journalist who found out this is a scam. Publish your article before the company is listed!

name: Botland Chronicles
description: It has been 200 years since the aliens landed and destroyed human civilization on Earth. Cities lay in ruins. Weird creatures and rogue AI run rampant. Somewhere in a dark warehouse, a small combat bot, merely a prototype, is accidentally switched on. Beep boop... What the heck?!

name: Blight: Survival
description: Blight: Survival is an upcoming medieval, co-operative, action horror game set in an alternate 14th century powered by Unreal Engine 5.

name: Bleed of Fear
description: Welcome to Bleed of Fear, a terrifying theme park filled with traps and horrors.

name: Blast Cats
description: Blast Cats is a love letter to classic 3D platformers! Bomb your enemies to smithereens and smash them flat with your mighty hammer! Find precious gems as you run and jump through secret worlds. Fight powerful foes and show them who’s boss! Adventure explodes unto the world, hang in there baby!

name: B.L.A.C.K. 1
description: You are drifting in space... Your Oxygen is running out... And suddenly bandits start to take interest in your tiny, experimental space Capsule.

name: Bitgun: Prelude
description: Bitgun Prelude is an intense zombie shooter that will test your skills to the limit. With guns that break quickly and no gear to help you when you die, you'll need to be on your toes if you want to survive. Can you make it through the hordes of zombies and make it to safety?

name: Bounce Castle
description: Control powerful heroes in a magical fantasy world to defeat monsters that threaten the kingdom. This turn-based physics/strategy game will have you bouncing and booping enemies using a mixture of precision and chaos to save the realm from all kinds of hand-drawn baddies.

name: Bounce Classic
description: Bounce is a 2D platformer in which you need to control a red ball. Dodge sharp spikes, use special abilities to collect all the rings scattered on the map and then you will open the way to the next interesting levels. Feel a sense of nostalgia and classics!

name: Boxception
description: What would happen if boxes were used for more than just storage? What if they could float? Be controlled at a distance? Or even rewind through time? Boxception gives you plenty of different boxes to overcome puzzles with.

name: BrainAccelerator
description: Sin descripción

name: Brutal Chase Turbo
description: Classic arcade racer. Chase, ram and destroy enemies with your police car.

name: Broken Tactics
description: A tactics game that breaks all the rules. Destroy the environment to gain an advantage. Fight in a fantasy world with magical abilities, powerful physical attacks and a cast of memorable characters of your own design. Build your team of resistance fighters to liberate the people of a broken land.

name: Brew
description: Face the challenges of The Tower as you enroll into the Alchemy Academy in this action-packed, third-person, roguelite. Brew potions to boost yourself in the heat of battle and use multiple weapons to defeat dangerous foes and pass your exams!

name: Break Pattern
description: Souls-lite shooter with puzzles. So you will shoot a lot. It may get hard some times. And you will need to solve puzzles. And the platforms... Yeah, a lot of jumping to.

name: Birnchen & Yoshie: Minor Confrontations
description: Visit Birnchen and Yoshie in their playroom and fight each other for a bowl of candy in this colorful RTS! Whether it's fruity attack or stormy chaos, you choose the side!

name: Birds Are Real
description: Birds Are Real is an accurate Bird simulator with a focus on the day to day birds goal of target acquisition and vaporization.

name: Binary Syndrome
description: The year is 2101, in a near future where the line between man and machine is fading. Through counseling, the film unravels the disease of inoperability caused by 21g, which has suddenly increased in some androids. It is a PC-98 respect command-click ADV with FM sound music and 20 color dots.

name: Bill
description: Bill is a master in crafting, restoring, and building - Craft tools, items, and upgrades for your home - Grow your food - Take care of yourself - Make money online by shipping your creations. Help a baby alien who crashed in your garden by feeding him and building a homemade rocket.

name: Bias
description: Caught in the Terror of Bias." The protagonist, a film actor, has moved with his wife to a new residential area. During the moving process, his wife suddenly disappears. You enter a strange world in this residential area that began with the disappearance of his wife.

name: Beware the Bully Redux
description: You can’t escape the Bully! Beware The Bully Redux is a fast-paced action platformer. You must run and dash your way through obstacles and challenges and try to avoid the Bully in this story-driven adventure!

name: Beneath the Deep
description: Beneath The Deep is a Sci-Fi Horror game Inspired by the 80's retro style. It takes place deep beneath the sea in a Facility where human testing is done. Nightmarish Monsters lurk beneath the Deep

name: Before Sunset
description: Before Sunset is a 2D hand-drawn mystery and psychological horror game. Ah-Dan lives with his blind mother and also his pet dog in an old village. Since a very young age, Ah-Dan knows the rule of the village to always come home Before Sunset.

name: Ardent Azur
description: Join Azur and Selen in an epic journey to find who's spreading chaos in Lunocea in this simple but yet deep turn-based strategy game !

name: Archetypes: The Rite of Passage
description: Discover the depth of your personality while journeying along the path of initiation as the young Viking Olaf. Every choice will impact your environment, and contribute to a map of your archetypical psychology. Embrace your inner warrior, lover, chieftain, and druid - and change the world!

name: App Co Tycoon
description: App Co Tycoon is Bussiness Managament Game

name: Apotheosis
description: Apotheosis is a single player turn based RPG that takes place in a surreal universe. Discover the powers of the Archetypes that lie within and use them to your advantage. Solve puzzles, explore mazes and unveil the truth about your past.

name: Ants With Guns
description: Ants with guns is a sandbox battle simulator that lets you play with ants and have them battle one another like you were a child again or if you're in your childhood it lets you do what you probably already do. Except a lot cooler than your childhood because they’ve got guns... and rocket flies.

name: Anti-Nightmare Master Plan
description: Wipe out superior forces of nightmare monsters and protect the dreamer. Create your own unique skill path for a variety of weapons. Evolve through a rogue-lite system and overcome the nightmares.

name: Anomalous Zone
description: Containing breakthrough? Supernatural invasion? You will play the role of an investigator involved in the incident, facing the unknown environment and defeating the terrifying enemy.

name: Anolock
description: The hero of a petty noble who lost his family and servants due to a pandemic will hire three maids with a referral from his friend. Through contact with them, we will recover from the sadness of loss and the suffering of sequelae.

name: Go to Hell
description: Go to hell is an adventure FPS with a pixel art style, you have to find items to advance in your quest and fight against angels.

name: Beboop to the Rescue!
description: Beboop is a rescue robot built to help other robots in times of need! Help Beboop in this educational puzzle platformer game about Math, with the target audience of 4th Grade or above.

name: Beauty and the Beast
description: Explore, uncover, and unravel the mystery behind the Beast and his residence in this first-person narrative adventure.

name: Battle Rift
description: This is Battle Rift, a sci fi, first-person shooter. It's like Super Mario only harder and in 3D and of course with weapons. The main mode is the "Challenge Mode" where you fight your way through 20 hard levels.

name: Battlefield Priest
description: this is a RTS strategy game,if you like Warcraft or Command & Conquer you maybe like this game players controller a priest to healing soldiers and choose which kind of soldiers the kingdom need , killing monters and murch for their nests

name: Battle Charge
description: Medieval 3rd person action RPG. Lead your troops and loyal companions into short but intense skirmish battles. Charge into the enemy lines. Use the best strategy to defeat the opposing army and defend your ground. Think tactics, epic clashes, shield walls, executions, traps & more. Survive & levelUp

name: Base Commander
description: A team MOBA where players try to outplay their opponents for control of empowered bases on the map.

name: Bad Impressions
description: Bad Impressions is a game where you draw a character card and a scenario card and you have to improvise how that character would react to the situation. Hundreds of cards gives thousands of unique scenarios.

name: Agony: Lords of Hell
description:
Build your empire on the bones of the Lords of Hell to become the absolute ruler of the underworld!

The main inspiration for the gameplay in Agony: Lords of Hell is the iconic Populous series. While the main character of the game - Nimrod, will focus on developing the city and managing the army, the demonic Vydijia will become the main unit controlled by the player. With numerous combat skills and special powers, Vydija will lead Nimrod's army to victory, and will be the key strategic element of every battle.

Thanks to her high position among other succubi, Vydija will use her abilities to seduce and then incorporate martyrs, who do not belong to any of the factions, into her own army.

name: Aftertime
description: A first-person survival horror set in a post-apocalyptic linear world with ultra-realistic, 3D-scanned environments varying from cities, indoors, forests, caves where you encounter zombies, dinosaurs, giant mushrooms and massive creatures mutated by toxins released from a meteor crash.

name: Agora
description: Agora is an upcoming single player puzzle platformer shooter from K.O. Koala Entertainment. Players will tackle visceral physics-based challenges as they unravel the mysterious circumstances surrounding their enlistment into the advanced technology corporation, Agora.

name: Alchemist Tris's Desire
description: Control the main character, Alchemist Tris. and collect the materials for the items needed to solve the problems of the villagers. This is an RPG in which the player collects the materials for the items needed to solve the problems while exploring the forest.

name: Al-Ankabut
description: Al Ankabut involves the hunt for the frailest of webs, the spider’s web. Throughout this journey, the player is tried with mathematical challenges and taught wisdom from the holy book.

name: Avocado Puzzle Quest
description: Collect match 3 together with a fun Avocado!

name: As simple as it could get
description: Survive this harsh world in a survival game where you make friends and also complete the story of the game we will see you in game soon.

name: Among Stars
description: Among Stars is about the survival of the human species. Fighting will take place in space on stations, ships and on planets. Spaceships with advanced technology can give you the upper hand to survive and defeat the alien invaders. Play solo or have multiple players unite to withstand the invasion

name: Anachroma
description: Anachroma is a first-person adventure and puzzle game where you play Ana, the young princess of the Mag Mell isles. She seeks to restore colors to a black-and-white world using a mysterious artifact, the Eye of Re.

name: An Architect's Adventure
description: This is a 3D Sokoban game. Adjacent blocks are connected together. You need to construct the structure required for each level through whimsy to pass the level.

name: Andromeda Acolytes
description: You play all four heroines in this big multi-chapter sci-fi text adventure. Negotiate underwater mechs, AIs, abandoned cities, crime, friendship, suspense, horror, humour, an art exhibition, virtual realities and a tank. Experience each PC via first-person prose as you puzzle, converse and explore.

name: Anime Prison: Gisele's Escape
description: A story based action-adventure game where you play as an Anime girl, Gisele who was wrongfully imprisoned for burning down an orphanage. Fight your way through various enemies and complete quests as you try and figure out how to escape from prison in Anime Prison - Gisele's Escape!

name: Anodos
description: A kinetic visual novel featuring questionable meats, weird friends, and irresponsibly bizarre adventures.

name: A Forever Solitude
description: You are on a 200 year voyage to a distant galaxy. You have awakened… A lifetime too soon. Do you choose to survive? Solve puzzles and determine your fate in a punishing environment. A cinematic experience. Atmospheric, emotional and beautiful. From solo developer David Fazzio.

name: Adventures of the Old Testament: The Bible Video Game
description: Experience the Bible in a new, interactive way. Read, Watch, and Play through the Scriptures in this action-adventure faith-based game! Interact with others through our Community Hub, Old Jerusalem!

name: AdventureQuest Worlds: Infinity
description: AdventureQuest Worlds: Infinity is the anything-goes fantasy MMORPG. The game is growing under your Hero's feet as you play. Featuring weekly updates, 100+ Classes, 10,000+ weapons, absolutely crazy storylines, and the freedom to play and be whatever your heart desires.

name: Acras
description: A High Fantasy top down Strategy RPG. Featuring a colorful and diverse cast of characters, free movement turn based strategy combat, a unique spell and inventory upgrade system, topped of with an engaging and dramatic story. Built from the ground up to support how you like to play your rpg's.

name: Franco and Apollo
description: Franco and Apollo is a rogue-lite survival action game with auto-shooting. Fight against hoards of enemies side by side with your robot dog. Combine weapons and characters to get stronger and be able to defeat all the bosses!

name: Crete
description: Fight against the Ancestors and other biopunk creatures. Use their DNA to build your procedural weapons, find a friend and combine your skills to be even more powerful. The further you go, the better rewards you will get for the next run. It is up to you to reveal what is up there in the north.

name: Dodge
description: Come to a tense and exciting game, Train your refection. Dodge incoming traps, Get a high score!

name: Boxel Golf
description: Boxel Golf is a multiplayer golf game packed with challenging courses, custom hats, and a powerful level builder.

name: Kapow Pets
description: Play Kapow Pets using physics-based blasts to strategically move your pet through a variety of levels full of dangerous traps and hazards. Collect treats and treasure! Unlock new pets and pet skins to complete the ultimate collection of Kapow Pets!

name: Meteorites 3D
description: Experience the retro inspired game Meteorite 3D built for modern 3D rendering, being a spiritual successor to the space games of old

name: Tipu
description: Use your snappy tongue and guide Tipu back to his spaceship.

name: Wakatami Village
description: A stylized, first person horror game focusing on discovery and combat. Centred around the story of a child on his path to discover the post apocalyptic world he had been sheltered from his whole life. Discover optional stories and secrets in an unforgiving hostile world.

name: Trigger Impact
description: A deadly virus breaks out and spreads the world with infectious predators and animals. You will have to Rise and defeat rivals by searching & scavenging for firearms, weapons, food, and water used to survive not only the night but each other as everyone is forced to fight for resources and life!

name: Homebound: The Last Stand
description: Homebound is a single-player, top-down, survival game. Where you have to loot, kill, and build a new home! you have to protect your new home from waves of zombies who will try to destroy your newfound shelter.

name: Stasis Valley
description: Stasis Valley is an action-platformer which follows Adam, a young man who descends into a world frozen in time. Uncover its secrets, experience a story about grief, and confront the dangers lurking within the valley.

name: Space Mission Overdrive
description: Defend your planet against the Space Invaders. Build your defences against lovecraftian spacecrafts. Keep your health up and you might even become an invader yourself! Warning: this game contains flashing images that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy.

name: The White Raven
description: Wage tactical war, Explore spiritual hellscapes, and Spark beautiful romance, or bitter rivalries in this Open World turn-based Tactical RPG: The White Raven.

name: DraeAscaria
description: DraeAscaria is a cozy, magical adventure RPG with farm sim elements. Experience a compelling story, rich cast of characters and original music.

name: Subsequence
description: Subsequence is a linear single player story driven 3D adventure game about overcoming obstacles, solving logical puzzles and exploration of the world.

name: Hunt of the Reptorians
description: Build a deck to captain your starship. Carve apart enemy ships chunk by chunk. Design your ship to fit your play style and adapt to enemy strategies. Duck and hide from the reptilian beasts while you build up your fleet's strength to reclaim Earth.

name: Hexahedron
description: A puzzle platformer where you play as an AI being tested to determine your intelligence in puzzle solving.

name: Starcross Starcade Special
description: Tear through enemies and bosses with stylish hack-and-slash combat in a mysterious unreleased arcade game. All while spending time in the Starcross Starcade, the massive arcade in the heart of Demon City.

name: Miira
description: A gameplay-focused puzzle-horror mashup. Escape the nightmarish mazes of your own psyche by hiding, running, and solving puzzles.

name: Public Transport Simulator
description: Buy old station to rebuild the depot. A realistic simulator of a public transport manager. Repair old buses, decide what trams will look like, hire best people. Earn money and give people the best transport in the city!

name: Take Control
description: Take Control is an action game with puzzle elements that takes place in the future. To fully master the ability to control minds a DNM operative will have to pass a series of tests. Your mind is your main weapon!

name: Short Stories Paranoia
description: How do you know, if something is real, or just in your mind? Are you really sure that you can distinguish imagination from reality? For the next couple of hours, listen, watch and be part of a story where imagination and reality intersect each other.

name: Kenosis: The Liminal Tapes
description: Enjoy this single player horror experiences to explore, solve puzzles, find recordings and documents with lore, escape the monster, and try to find your way out of the creepy places of each tape.

name: The Pier Arcade
description: Play a great selection of physics-based and digital arcade games, just like those found in real-world arcades and piers, competing for high scores, tickets and jackpots.

name: A Path to Light
description: An original handcrafted puzzle. Guide your steps and find the way. Sometimes the path can be hard. The goal is to touch the triangle(light).

name: Eggs 2142
description: The Galactic Eggpire are taking over the galaxy. Join The Scrambled Alliance and roll, launch and scramble some eggs!

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Hospital
description: The 5th "Japanese Escape Games" series! This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).

name: Adopt an Animal Near Me
description: Once the important decision to adopt an animal has been made, the interview phase begins. It is important that all those who are going to live with the animal meet some basic requirements, for that reason, the shelter will ask you a series of questions to check that you have all the characteristics of a true animal lover.

name: Fightro
description:
Fightro is 2D Arcade Fighting Game,

If you are an oldschool fighting game lover, this game is for you!

Our character is a blonde professional fighter, his opponent is not weak, but he has to turn his opponent down!

Can you beat the AI with its awesome fighting mechanics?
Defeat your enemy by making combos.
Making the right move at the right time is very important, Sometimes defense is the best solution!

name: Motorcycle Driving Simulator: Dirt & Parking 2022 - Racing Games Ultimate 4x4 City Offroad Kart
description: Sin descripción

name: Cow Rush: Water Adventure
description:
Take control of the sea cow in this fast-paced aquatic adventure! Get ready for a dash of adrenaline! Survive as long as you can and dodge the treacherous obstacles. Have a blast trying to avoid many different sea creatures. There are jellyfishes, sea turtles, seahorses, sea stars, and angry sharks in the water! Remember, don't touch their sharp teeth. Sharks can be hungry!

Master your skills to dash around the dangerous seafloor and dodge to go as far as you can in this endless short session game.

name: Robotica
description: Play with friends and defend The Tower from corrupt robotic organisms.

name: Ayatana
description: Welcome to the mysterious world of Ayatana! The first stop will be the discovery of Asian temples. You will play as Ava who is looking for her missing friend. Through many clues, help Ava to find Julia by solving puzzles and find the temple of Ayatana.

name: Horns of Justice
description: Play the brutal ball sport where death is the only referee. Master your weapons, spells and tactics to become the ultimate player in the deadliest tournament in history. Play Campaign for a storyline unique to MOBA’s or dish it out in online multiplayer.

name: The Analyst
description: In this espionage-action game, you have to use your very particular set of skills to “recruit” a pair of scientists into the agency before your rivals, who will use any means necessary to get to them first.

name: Gates of Devoroth
description: Travel through the Gates of Devoroth and explore a shattered world, on your own or with friends. Find the lost travel-wards to unlock new locations via the ancient Devorothian gate system. Gather loot and progress your character through experience and equipment.

name: Supernova Tactics
description: Sin descripción

name: Logicubes
description: Sin descripción

name: Peekazoo
description: Peekazoo is a party game about animals playing hide-and-seek on a 4–10 person luxury cruise liner. Crewmates should avoid being attacked and complete their mission while watching out for impostors who are ready to attack your crewmates and sabotage the mission.

name: RoBo: The Allectric Idventurer
description: In a world where humans’ souls were transferred into toys, plug into RoBo and join Robin, a creative Dyslexic kid, on an electric adventure through her memories & the Solar City. Head into an action-puzzle platformer, where you will be tackled by crazy challenges & overcome the SteamPunk Gang.

name: Inductor
description: Inductor is a sci-fi puzzle first-person shooter with the elements of a car simulator. The game combines puzzles and a lot of action in a large open world. Embark on an exciting journey. Save the world from the awakened evil.

name: OOTP Baseball Go 23
description: Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The Infinite Baseball Sandbox is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! Manage teams, control any franchise throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, and so much more! Play what the pros play!

name: Last Lap Heroes
description: Take control of the last laps in legendary races, represent famous teams and turn the tides from where it was supposed to go. Fall in love with the Tyrant or wear the Wombat Drivers Club coat with pride. Lock in your gear, push your luck and reach the finish line first, becoming the Last Lap Hero!

name: Sophonce
description: Sophonce is a science fiction psychological horror first-person shooter that relies on philosophical undertones as the primary focus of the plot.

name: Ziircon
description: Ziircon is a RPG rogue-lite platformer, with procedurally generated mind-bending, bone-breaking dungeons. You rise from the dead, an average squire. You die and rise evermore to defeat what corrupted the world. The entire world crushes you over and over. Can you prevail over this challenge?

name: Wake of Ragnarok
description: An action-rpg where some survived Ragnarok, the end of the world. Explore, find new equipment, upgrade your skills and bring the fight to the hordes of enemies and bosses standing in your way of getting home to Asgard.

name: Project Death Strikers
description: Death Striker is a Couch Co-op, run'n'gun shooter. Fight through the hordes of enemies. Take out punishing bosses to find out what caused the mutation. Your choices will decide how this apocalypse ends.

name: Primal Hunger
description: Hunt or be hunted. Eat or be eaten. Evolve or die. Grow stronger and evolve with each victory on your way to becoming the Alpha Predator in this thrilling battle royale.

name: Street Artist Simulator
description: Become a street artist, let art set you free! Street Artist Simulator is an open-world action game where you’re a writer. Find spots, draw graffiti and become a legend. Just remember, don’t get busted.

name: Skate Shop Simulator
description: Build, run & create your own Skate Shops. Renovate, upgrade and expand your services and create your own shopping empire! Skate Shop Simulator allows you to create and run your own skate shop network.

name: Alchem It
description: Become an alchemist shopkeeper and serve potions to your customers. Master your tools to gather many ingredients and brew potions as fast as you can. Unlock new tools, levels and decorate your dream alchemy shop.

name: Excommunicado
description: Rogue-lite deck-builder set in the gritty film-noir world of assassins and killers. Play as one of 5 unique specialists, power up with permanent upgrades, beat the game and then strap in for the next ride with end-game modifiers for near limitless challenge.

name: Red Nivis
description: A rogue-like metroidvania where you explore the ruins of the Red Nivis Laboratory. No run will be the same, but will also give you the metroidvania feeling of finding a shortcut, or remembering that there's a cool area you can now explore.

name: Unnatural: Land of Dead
description: Unnantural: Land of Dead Its story of Unnatural things happening in a Land where there are Dead/Undead everywhere you go & where ever you look.

name: Affinity: Fallen from Paradise
description: Journey through a broken world, discovering its long forgotten secrets. Experience a non linear story in a lore filled world, and learning new abilities to survive againist otherworldly threats. Can you make it back to Paradise?

name: Berserk Reborn
description: Berserk Reborn is a collectible card MMO where you will fight to rule the world of Udhin. Form squads, get legendary cards and defeat your enemies to become a legend of the world of Udhin.

name: Born Anew
description: Born Anew is a 2D Platformer set in an Open world Life Simulator set in a Fantasy Medieval world full of Adventures to be had, the game has many ways to play it and it will NOT have a main Story line. Build your own Fate and Future.

name: Fire Station Renovation
description: Fire Station Renovation is a renovator simulator for abandoned and forgotten fire stations. Buy old hovels, repaint, redecorate, clean and even build rodent traps and bring the firehouse back to life!

name: Cable Clutter
description: Cable Clutter is a puzzle game where objects can be connected to each other to change their behaviour. Puzzles can be solved by pressing buttons, automation, and some head scratching.

name: Flibbles
description: A casual adventure in third-person perspective, battle a mysterious purple Goo preventing it from consuming Flibble Land. A unique experience about a farmer and cute intriguing creatures.

name: Little Islanders
description: Your people need you, and you've been summoned to protect and guide them in their time of need. You must help them settle the island that they now find themselves inhabiting. Help them build their town, protect them, and ensure that they thrive.

name: Boomer Zombie
description: Sin descripción

name: A Mole in a Hole
description: Sin descripción

name: Fight In Hole
description: Sin descripción

name: A Cup of Coffee
description: Sin descripción

name: Hovercraft: Getaway
description:
The #1 combat racing, custom vehicle building, totally addicting, action game of the year is back, and crazier than ever!
You’re on the run! Build your custom Hovercraft. Arm it to the teeth with machine guns, lasers, rockets, and mines. Then evade, attack, and survive as long as you can to make your Getaway!

name: Project Morph
description: Project Morph is an isometric, souls-like, sci-fi action-RPG wit a unique player shapeshifting mechanic. Collect enemy DNA and use it to transform into various creatures, called 'Morphs'. Become your enemy, literally, and fight fire with fire!

name: M.S. Salmon
description: The game takes place in an antropomorphic world in the late 1960’s where our protagonist Ben Hearnden, a penguin detective, has to solve a murder case on a luxury ship called M.S. Salmon. While he collects the evidences on the ship, he isn’t only coming closer to the truth of the case, but also lighting up his own dark past. M. S Salmon is an interactive 2d animation film combined with minigames such as railshooter-levels, point & click and gastro sim.

name: Trailmappers
description: Trailmakers is full of adventures! But after awhile, the same maps start getting old. Now with modding, a new era has emerged. An era of creation from the community not bound to just vehicles. No longer are we limited to stock maps -- it's time to create your own adventures with Trailmappers!

name: Netspectre
description: Netspectre is a hacker roguelike set in a ruthless, cyberpunk universe. Infiltrate networks, improve your machine, navigate the challenges of daily life as a netspectre in a futuristic megacity, and perhaps even become one of its many legends!

name: ChibiTama
description: Deploy your players and supporters, and band together to survive the stages! As you do so, your characters will grow! Little cute characters are waiting for you! Stay tuned for more features and characters to be added soon!

name: Oldowan
description: Oldowan is a first-person casual survival sandbox game that is focused on very early humanity and how it developed. The crafting is all based on real practices, but the survival aspects are relaxed. Play solo or with 1-3 friends.

name: Wings VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Heated
description: HEATED combines RTS elements with FPS elements in a spin on the FPS genre. Purchase mining rigs to get as much gold as possible, while hacking your opponents to hinder their mining. Then, there's the "action phase," where teams use gold to purchase equipment to take down their opponent.

name: Cognition Method
description: Cognition Method is a story-driven, first-person puzzle game inspired by Space Odyssey 2001 and Solaris. Discover an innovative mechanics of altering gravity and dive into the surreal setting. Find your way within a mysterious artifact and unveal a non-ordinary story.

name: Bring Death
description: Revenge your loved ones - No matter what it takes, and no matter how much suffering you have to inflict!

name: Zero World
description: Gather resources, craft items, kill others, raid houses, but don't get raided yourself

name: SparkMutts
description: Explore a Massive procedurally generated Steampunk world full of smart Dogs. Meet Villagers, Brave dangers in procedural Dungeons, Buy or build your home, Craft Innovative Gadgets and explore vast biomes with fantastical mechanical Beasts on this Brass Filled Adventure.

name: Master of Earth
description: A voice from beyond awakens the vast potential within you. As you master these unearthed powers, you will raise the secrets hidden in a temple once thought destroyed.

name: Gangstar New York
description: Welcome to the Big Apple, a huge free-to-play social sandbox ripe for the taking. Race, shoot, steal, and jetpack your way to the top of the underworld in a near-future New York. Claim the Kingpin title, change the game for everyone and reap the rewards. Your city, your rules.

name: The Fate of Baldr
description: Join the Vikings in an epic tower defense adventure! Defend your ship against mythical bosses while mining resources and upgrading skills. Battle solo or team up with friends in online co-op for a journey of strategy, conquest, and victory.

name: Ex0 Escape
description: Ex0 Escape is a third-person looter shooter bullet hell. Evade lasers, loot defeated enemies, and grapple your way out of the facility. Build up your Ex0 with modules, become a threat to humanity, and find greater and greater weapons to become an unstoppable force!

name: Metal Shock Game
description: Sin descripción

name: HopeLand
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Mine
description: Go through the numerous mazes and try to get to the cave full of gold waiting at the end, but remember - the journey won't be easy. Think fast and move precisely to get to the exit - any delay may result in the escape portal to be covered with mysterious water, blocking your way out.

name: Deepfield
description: Deepfield is a sandbox RTS set in the tiny world of microbiology. Deepfield's microverse is alive and contains many biomes, each with their own mix of environmental mechanics and unique enemy types. Find and exploit resources, multiply in number and expand your territory to fend off extinction.

name: Sub Chase Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Circuit Defender
description: Circuit Defender is a tower defence game, where you need to protect your electrical components from various forms of ESD, lightning strikes and overvoltages. Come on in, and defend your components!

name: Lost Melody
description: Sin descripción

name: Pando Engines
description: Sin descripción

name: Hooking Season
description: Hooking Season is a chaotic couch competitive new take on the twin stick shooter gameplay, up to four players. Use your hook for maneuvering around the levels, and grabbing your opponents. The more you eat the fatter you get and in this world the fatter the better.

name: Mana Valley
description: A strange dark force has moved over mana valley turning once friendly creatures into vicious adversaries. As a novice witch, you must hone your skills in magic to find and defeat the evil that is plaguing your home.

name: Spirit Eyes
