description: Spirit Eyes is a horror game in which, as an experienced exorcist, you take a contract to an abandoned house in Wyoming. Player must discover the type of ghost and try to get rid of it. As you try to communicate with the spirit, you will have to make choices that will affect the course of the game.

name: Rapid Retort
description: Test your speed, aim, and awareness in Rapid Retort as you tackle a series of progressively more complex shooting trials.

name: Pirate's Den Renovator
description: Help a devastated harbor bay get back on its feet just after being attacked and burned down. Rebuild, renovate and expand your new stationary business. Attract as many customers as possible, take care of the supply chain and micromanage workshops to become the greatest retired pirate ever!

name: Pixel Gangsters
description: Run your gang of mobsters and conquer the city in this indie mafia tycoon game.

name: Lum: Hide from Nightmares
description: Lum is a stealth and puzzle game where you control a soul and its companion dog. Hide and run from the nightmare creatures of this dreadful place while solving puzzles. Escape from the limbo to find peace in this short adventure!

name: Server Owner Tycoon
description: Server Owner Tycoon has you step into the shoes of a game server owner to build your own online empire. Manage your staff members, catch the latest trends, keep users satisfied, research new features, and administer your server. Do you have what it takes to become the best server owner?

name: Our Hero! Last
description: Start the last Our Hero! adventure which ends the trilogy: a new hero joins the party to help Ourhero, Tay and Fury to fight in the final epic battle!

name: After Corruption
description: A retro survival horror game where you dive into fragmented procedural levels to try and save the world from the corruption that destroyed it

name: The Explorator
description: Explore mysterious counter-zones and brave dangers to discover priceless treasures buried beneath the ruins of Atlantis.

name: Celestial Tear: Lost World
description: Explore an eerie planet marooned in a dark dimension known as the void. Command a dysfunctional trio of soldiers in fast-paced tactical combat with otherworldly creatures. Scavenge for supplies and build a camp to survive the harsh environment on this Lost World!

name: Tikus Tales
description: Tikus Tales is a single-player/2-player split-screen couch co-op 3D action platformer game about a mouse and a squirrel that are thrust into the role of recovering a stolen relic. The game is a mixture of platforming, combat and puzzle solving, with boss fights and collectibles to be found.

name: Object Wars
description: The war is small, in Object Wars fights the other players with weapons like a toothpick launcher, the last one alive wins the game.

name: Motel Simulator
description: An abandoned motel across from the gas station. Renovate and furnish it, rent rooms and expand. Pick your patrons wisely - just handing them their room key and getting their cash is just where the adventure with your guests starts…

name: Alien Decimation
description: Destroy waves of UFOs in a arcade style space shooter with an array of powerful weaponry.

name: Blight
description: Five strangers from different backgrounds must work together to save the world in a squad based tactical action game dripping with '80s horror charm.

name: Snow War
description: In the cold of an arctic apocalypse the human race is stuck in the 80’s and the only thing left to do is sling snowballs at your friends and foes!

name: Matcha
description: Matcha is a simple puzzle game, built around the beautiful Korean writing system, Hangul.

name: Tactic Legends
description: Tactic Legends is a free-to-play, player-vs-player turn-based strategy game for mobile, inspired by games such as Final Fantasy Tactics and Tactics Ogre. Characters and environmental objects are 2D, while the game maps are in a 3D rotatable space.

name: Pencil Case TD
description: Pencil Case TD is a tower defense game with pencil cases and stationery as the theme. Players need to use different stationery to guard their scores to get promoted.

name: Droid Warfare
description: An exoplanet named Pumara is a highly resourceful world & is civilized by cybernetic androids. An army of Alien- based Androids launches an international invasion in attempt to take control of the planet. The citizens of Pumara formed an alliance to fight the alien forces & to protect their planet.

name: Zombie Apocalypse: The Last Defense
description: Create your own strategies, tactics and manage your resources in this survival tower defense game. Buy weapons, vehicles, explosives, soldiers, turrets and battle against huge waves of zombies. Can you survive for 25 days?

name: Para-Lax
description: Para-Lax is a 2D platformer in which you play as a hero named Lax and help a farmer get back his stolen dirt! Wander through a beautiful Pixel-World, avoid the traps and kill as much goblins as you can.

name: Anomalia
description: You must survive this horror and puzzle game, Robots were created to aid in technological advances, but here they are getting more and more terrible, explore the place and delve deeper into the terror.

name: Bravery
description: In Bravery, the player must defend his brewery by building crossbow, automatic crossbow, and flamethrower towers, which can be augmented with minion pawns. Pawns can be equipped with hammers and shields if improvements are purchased for their brewery.

name: Descentium
description: Whilst researching the mysterious new element Descentium, A remote facility in Southeast Asia has gone radio silent. Alina, an elite operative who works for Descent Laboratories has been sent to investigate. Will Alina discover the secrets of the temple or fall into madness?

name: Dash Shooters
description: Dash Shooters is a multiplayer, fast paced racing game, where the main movement mechanic is dashing! You can race through a randomly generated map, gather powerups, fight your friends, go through objectives, shoot crystals, and much more! Play with up to six of your friends for endless fun!

name: The Dam Nation
description: The Dam Nation is a roguelike FPS where you will need to consider which enemies you can fight and which can be evaded. You can use tools to break your enemies’ lines of communication, lure them into traps, or when the situation calls for it - shoot them in the face with a rocket.

name: Lymph City Blues
description: Take on the role of a detective immune cell named Dan Dendrick in this neo-noir narrative. Track down and uncover the murderer of the mayor of Lymph City using your sleuthing prowess and bring justice back to Lymph City...for no one is immune to justice.

name: Mothercore
description: A tower defense game with weird and wacky towers and enemies. Play in the two modes, Story mode and Arcade mode. And follow a weird story about an organization and last power source humans have.

name: Monkey Milk
description: You're monkey must collect fruit to process into delicious beverages while avoiding not-so-friendly creatures that live alongside the groves of fruit in this level based, top down game.

name: War of Bellrook
description: Go forth on a text-based, choose your own adventure where you can choose your role and embark on adventure as various different people who tread different paths.

name: Tribe War
description: It is a strategic card game (SCG) that combines the genre of card games, chess, and chess. Create an original deck and use your card to target your opponent's base Stores, card packs, and new species will be added in the future.

name: Bloodwatch
description: Bloodwatch is a short horror game about surviving at all cost on the island when the maniacs are trying to find and kill you. Explore, finding weapons, items, find the leader and kill him.

name: Neon Circle
description: Rotate, think, wait, jump and rotate the screen.

name: Alaris
description:
A global crisis that only continues to escalate. A dangerous run-in with a shadowy stranger. And a mysterious word that won't stop gnawing at you. How does everything tie together? And what role could you possibly play in all of this?

Enter a world of magic—of Fae and Dragon.

name: Warrior Souls
description: Warrior Souls is a multiplayer and singelplayer medieval-fantasy game. Play with your friends or fight with other players in brutal battles. You can choose different Warriors from knights to samurais or Vikings. You will experience 1vs1, a great story, castle fights, and more.

name: Warplane Quest
description: Warplane Quest tells the story of a young pilot destined to become a legendary flying ace. The game features intense dogfights, varied missions, beautiful landscapes and procedurally generated battlefields.

name: Warped Times
description: Born in a dystopian world, you will discover the secrets of the magic stone which provides life and death to whole civilizations. Experience the fight between good and evil, as well as the blending of time and space itself. And in the end, maybe you will save more than one civilization!

name: What the Fortress!?
description: A Tower Defense game where you carve the path for your enemies and you form the terrain. Unlock 20+ Towers, fight against 30 types of enemies and choose from 5 different ground tiles.

name: Water Fall
description: Immersive side-scroller in a world where water has become scarce

name: Bicycle Mechanic Simulator
description: Run your bicycle workshop and repair bicycles by your own hand. Tighten the screws, adjust the chain, and then do some personalized printing. It's not just your sweat that makes you a bicycle repair master, but your attention to detail and skills.

name: BicycleSim
description: Buy, Assemble and Ride a bicycle. Choose from a large number of Bicycle variants. Can ride the pre-built bicycles in a wide number of exotic environments and locations !!

name: Binary.
description: Binary. is a cybernetic stylish action game where you fight viruses with big swords and guns. You are a freelance cracker who must dive into the net to fight the defenses and take control of the net. Use stylish swordplay and gunfire to create combos and fight off viruses in spectacular fashion.

name: Beast Fists
description: Are you ready to face your fears and fight for your freedom? Unleash your inner Beast and take it back!!!

name: Bear the Terrain
description: Metroidvania style reverse bridge builder game. Build vehicles, pick up hitchhikers and escape the deadly island. Finished the story? Play against frinds in a local PvP mode.

name: Beasts Rampage
description: Forge your path through the unknown kingdom. Explore a variety of landscapes and caverns infested with vast monsters and creatures. Battle your way through and explore the kingdom in this 2.5D Style shooter-platform-fighting game.

name: Beasts of Merit
description: In this non-linear dystopian adventure, your goal is to hunt down dissidents standing in the way of a brighter future. Interrogate your fellow citizens, gain evidence of dissent, reveal their motives, and decide their fates. Support the system or use your position to dismantle it, brick by brick.

name: Balam: Bounce Hell
description: Balam: Bounce Hell is a non-shooting bullet hell set in Pre-Columbian America. You won't be able to directly attack the enemies you find in your path. It will only be possible to finish off your opponents by rebounding their own attacks. That is why, in Balam, defense is always the best attack.

name: A Town Called Happenstance
description: Save the programmer, save the world! Help freelance detective Carter Montague by pointing & clicking (or rather pointing & dragging) to track down a missing developer and stop an evil corporation from holding the entire world hostage!

name: Audioclash: Battle of the Bands
description: Sin descripción

name: Augury
description: A fantasy RTS game set in a massive procedurally generated world. Build, explore, and survive while trying to uncover the dark secrets of these forgotten lands.

name: Anitons
description: Anitons is an vast world monster collection RPG featuring base building, farming and real time combat. Explore vast world and tame, look after and evolve creatures that you will catch.

name: Animal Zone
description: Animal zone is a fast and furious one-shot one-kill 2D shooter game. Make headshots, tear your opponents to pieces, and stay alive to take your place in the food chain! Face off against your friends and other players in this brutal animal world.

name: Angy
description: It's survival of the fittest lemming in this golf-like battle with epic abilities, deadly traps, and many maps! You can complete solo-challenges or play against your friends online or locally!

name: Grassland Defender Keita
description: It's a mix of shooting and running, shooting enemies with bows and arrows, saving animals with parachutes, and dodging cacti and crocodiles by jumping.

name: Stories School
description: Meet a very strange school that can not only teach you, but also entertain and scare you! Meet students and also teachers who are "Glad to see you".

name: NetaJump
description: NetaJump is a indie casual game where you grasp the chance to jump higher, unlock skins, or follow the hints in the skin descriptions to unlock them.

name: House of Witches
description: House of Witches is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will find an exciting story about the life of two lesbian witches who love sex very much. The game is filled with scenes of sex, humor and romance.

name: Miko no Kanata: Curious Tales from Oguni Shrine - Cycles
description: All the heroines are miko! Fighting miko! Working miko! Moe miko! A girl's love that pierces through time. A tragic fate imposed upon these fighting shrine maidens. And the darkness who seek to rampage through the world of night... With those strong feelings, will Yuuya and Akiha be together?!

name: Foster: Ghost Child
description: Foster: Ghost Child provides an atmospheric horror that incorporates East Asian elements rarely used in games. The game makes use of Chinese traditional elements to convey a distinct and frightful storyline that incorporates Taoism, Buddhism, and Chinese mythology.

name: Opalescence
description: The colorful top-down shooter/bullet-hell.

name: Shutter Labs
description: Work your way through 25 intricate puzzles designed to subvert your expectations using your trusty Shutter Cube as leverage to reach higher platforms... But keep in mind that each throw, is a dice roll, potentially causing you to swap places with your cube or you know, spontaneously combust!

name: Ashen Will
description: Trapped, and with enemies closing in, your only chance of survival is to rely on the simple camera you hold. Ashen Will is an atmospheric maze-based horror game, where your options are preciously low. No one is coming to help. No one is coming to save you. Survive.

name: Dan the Inmortal
description: Dan wants to reach the top to drink the fountain of mortality, will he be able to reach his goal?

name: Mist
description: Train skills, fight monsters, make friends, and explore the vast Mist universe. Play 6 distinct and different classes, each with their own set of abilities, strengths, and weaknesses.

name: Sinus
description: Shoot, loot, hack, level up, die, upgrade. SINUS is a futuristic action-platformer RPG, with metroidvania and roguelike elements. Synergize skills, weapons and items. Control powerful turrets, enemies or even cheat death. Explore generated maps to complete missions and stop SINUS, humanity's savior.

name: Engines of Destruction
description: Currently in development; EOD is a large-scale, tactical, combined-arms, PvP, FPS, featuring mechs and an emphasis on a wide variety of game modes, from realistic to casual. This game will feature full support for community servers and mods.

name: Brunch Rush
description: Brunch Rush is a Gameboy inspired RPG where you play as Claire, a young waitress at Lily's Diner, as she tries to make some money over the summer. Things don't go as planned.

name: Polyspell
description: Polyspell is a survival RPG based in a fantasy land where you manage a base that you build against titans. Place traps, create spells, craft weapons, fight off the titans and become stronger to prove your worthy of becoming a wizard

name: AirRaid
description: A remake of a classic 90's DOS action arcade shooter with modern, fully destructible enemies. 10 waves of progressively increasing insanity.

name: Night of Disturbance
description: This game is a short Horror experience, which you as the player will explore and travel through the linear story. This game will challenge you to face your fears and travel through creepy corridors and dark forests. Will you find the secrets lurking in the darkness?

name: Akari: The Five Eyed Fox
description: Play as Akari, a magical fox imbued with the power of light in this fast paced Metroidvania. Slash and Dash your way through an army of darkness and explore diverse, beautiful worlds.

name: Oden
description: Shape your destiny in the world of Oden, immersed in Sardinian Folklore. Use the powers of time to defeat your enemies in fast-paced and deadly combat, explore a lost world and uncover ancient stories from Oden's past. Challenge the will of the Tower of Heresy.

name: Hold On
description: Beat your enemy and building your own level.

name: Holodeck Arena
description: Compete for supremacy in this fast-paced cyberspace-RTS with exotic units and supply chains of your own making.

name: Tobin's Tale
description: Tobin's Tale! It's a game. About words. And throwing them. At adventures. It's the point & throw adventure game!

name: Autogame Deluxe
description: A one button party game where you battle to win rounds by being the last car driving on increasingly chaotic crossroads!

name: Delusional
description: When Kevin, the burglar, gets lost in the woods, he comes across an old abandoned mansion nearby. Later on, he'd decided to rob this mansion. However, he later discovers that the mansion he is attempting to rob is owned by an ex-doctor who is now known as a wanted Psychopathic Murderer.

name: No Way Out
description: No Way Out is a single-player psychological horror. Paranormal activity is on the rise and it’s up to you to get rid of it and get the hell out of the house.

name: Necrowave
description: Necrowave is a game about the emotional life of a zombie stuck in a microwave. It's a 2D platformer with critical based combat where each different enemy feels like a puzzle you need to solve instead of relying on brute hack & slash tactics.

name: Ion Stormfire
description: Fast paced shoot em up played across 12 levels. Point your ship in any direction, deciding constantly between extra firepower (firing in any 2 directions) and movement. Or deploy the directional shield to block bullets from a single direction, point your ship and dodge simultaneously.

name: Hyperspace Harvest
description: The whale is sick, dear child. Grow crops on its skin. Fight cells in its flesh. This is your purpose in this world. For the whale is god and it is sick and you are the remedy.​

name: Mara's Quest
description: Take command of Mara's Mercenaries in this turn-based isometric strategy game. Guide your party across 48 levels of combat, facing enemy soldiers, orcs, undead, and worse. Outfit your party with nearly 400 different pieces of equipment to come out victorious. Create and share your own maps.

name: Junkienator
description: Step into a janitor's shoes in this thrilling adventure! Clean the offices, solve puzzles and uncover dark secrets about your past. Want to throw those office plants? Do it! Have fun, but beware, something's wrong when you're at home.

name: Paragrowth
description: Paragrowth is Survival RPG game placed in giant dark forest. Scavenge and explore giant countryside areas overgrown by trees and mysterious living roots. Find hideout to survive nights full of paranormal activities. Hunt mutating prey for ingredients to inject enemies abilities into yourself.

name: BlackHill
description: A narrative-driven, single-player adventure like mom used to make, with a charming cast of characters and a touching story of self-discovery

name: Sosso
description: This is a slightly cute but brainstorming platform jump puzzle-solving game, you need to carefully observe to find the right route, get the key to open the door to the next gate.

name: Advenclave
description: After the attack on the Great Flying Library, you must unlock the mysteries behind the strange Grimoire you were entrusted. Uncover the secrets of the island you have found yourself on while defending the unique locals from the evils that lurk beneath the surface in this Sandbox Action-RPG.

name: True Demon
description: The devil has a new stock broker. In this game you'll play as True Demon who sets out to bring the corrupted back to hell. It is an adventure rpg with weapons, armor, dungeons, bosses, and treasure hunting. Come join True Demon in the Hell's trading floor.

name: Lovers in the Lunar Labyrinth
description: Play as Oberohm or Altania in this action plaformer roguelike game as they battle through the surreal landscapes of the moon. Explore the labyrinth, and use your powers and your allies to craft powerful weapons and abilities as you break through the cycle that keeps the lovers apart!

name: Polyion
description: A strategy game that hands you the reins of a world that you can populate, build upon and help thrive to reach new eras and milestones.

name: Selenelion
description: A portal back to August, Friday the 13th, 2021.

name: Clarice Clairvoyage
description: Clarice Clairvoyage is a traditional roguelike adventure where you'll need to navigate the open seas while exploring the islands which offer 'choose your own adventure' style quests.

name: Die to Survive
description: Gory rail shooter filled with action, explosions, boss battles, weapon upgrades, deamons and zombies ... lot´s of zombies.

name: Blood Hospital
description: "Blood Hospital" is a FPS Horror adventure game A young man with frequent headache woke up in an abandoned hospital.Here let him have a strange and familiar feeling, locked doors, drugs, dark corridors, the voice in the shadow... A Strange voices always appeared and guided him to do something..

name: Cyber Sokoban
description: Puzzle game based on sokoban mechanics with futuristic mechanics. Move the futuristic cubes to their respective places, deactivate the leisures and go through the portals to pass the level.

name: A Million Lightyears Beyond
description: A Starfighter simulation with a dynamic galaxy, Launch into epic missions in a living, dynamic world on your way to building a new home in a galaxy a million lightyears beyond our own.

name: Teahouse of Souls
description: Teahouse of Souls is a VR game that grows the seeds of emotions in a fairytale-like space and comforts the soul by making tea with harvested crops.

name: An Aspie Life Beginnings
description: The Ériu Islands of the Arctic, once famous for their mines, has slipped into disrepair and despair. Those who remain, live an isolated life, fractured by mental health. It’s up to you and your friends to solve a decades-long mystery and face the fears that hide deep underground or inside...

name: Hopeless
description: After years of burning coal, the heat came. The last survivors ride on a train, followed by the deadly light of the sun.

name: Specteared
description: Survival Horror with innovative mechanics. Custom procedural algorithms providing unique experience for each playthrough. Lot's of organic, procedural animation. Simulation of sound waves bouncing in facilities to help identify danger in really immersive way.

name: Reign Over
description: Build a fortress, raise an army, conquer your rivals! Hire heroes, equip them with rare artifacts and master their special abilities. Capture buildings and resources to train units and hire mercenaries. Lead them to victory in turn based combat!

name: Jurassic Architect
description: Jurassic Architect is a strategy game set in the not-so-distant future, from which humanity, thanks to the achievements of technology, escapes from a polluted and destroyed world to the age of the dinosaurs in order to be able to create a new civilization.

name: Territorial Duck
description: Chase away thousands of nosy animals from your pond while keeping your sanity! Then decorate your pond with flora and cute things you've shamelessly stolen. In this 2D Rogue-lite you live life a duck getting exponentially more powerful for each item you steal.

name: Deer Nightmare
description: Deer Nightmare - A 2D runner in which the player dodges approaching deer that can run over the girl, and the player who takes control tries to prevent this by collecting medicines and accumulating distance points. Game Features:

name: Ready for Riot
description: Immerse into real, hard american prison riot and test out yourself as a member of the police force. Do you have what it takes to control and recapture most danegrous convicts in the world?

name: Emberbane
description: Emberbane is a pixel action-platformer with combat revolving around a mixture of four elements with unique abilities. Join Ophelia on her journey to slay the malevolent gods of elements and bring equilibrium to the land; use the elementals to your advantage and uncover the untold tale of centuries.

name: Ending Tau
description: Morph every part of your body with powerful curses. Survive in a fast-paced roguelite world with different mechanics on every journey. Explore an untouched land inspired by a lost folk tale. Set your tribe free by Ending Tau.

name: Marscape
description: A survival management simulator on the red planet. Make sure your astronauts survive on Mars. Manage and expand your habitat. Produce enough resources, build facilities, explore the environment and brave the harsh weather until you are rescued.

name: Insane Town
description: The key elements of the game will be ingenuity and teamwork in order to understand other players’ roles, implement strategies, kill opponents, disguise themselves and resist until time runs out.

name: Vampiric Crown
description: Vampiric Crown is a side-scrolling action RPG set in a strange gothic world. A young vampire girl decides to rebel against her race, upon discovering that her sister will be the victim of a macabre plan to unearth the prince of darkness ...

name: Shadow's Light
description: Shadow's Light is an atmospheric 3D puzzle platformer about a child refugee and their shadow, trying to survive across two different planes of existence, while solving puzzles by travelling across multiple universes, and traversing levels by casting physically interactable shadows.

name: Soul of Kaeru
description: Soul of Kaeru is a Metroidvania-inspired VR game! Explore each corners of a miniature world set in an ancient samurai's zen garden where nature took back his right! But beware of the little creatures and insects, as they may not be as friendly as you would think...

name: Aria's Melody
description: Aria's Melody is a 2D action-adventure game inspired by retro classics. In this game you will travel across a vast world in search of answers to the darkness that plagues the lands.

name: Western City Renovator
description: Welcome to western city simulator Discover and restore abandoned cities and locations. Complete missions and assignments for Western Rail Company on a planned railroad route. Bring back to live ghost towns and solve the problems of the Wild West. Build your dream western city.

name: Anima Island
description: You awake on an unknown island full of strange inhabitants and powerful creatures called anima. Train anima and fight with them to unite the island's inhabitants against a dark force that looms inside the island.

name: Fairmoon Museum
description: Start your life as a curator in Fairmoon where you'll fix up and fill up a museum in a sleepy town full of interesting residents with lots to say. Customize your character, improve your house and local businesses, and get to know more about this curious little town.

name: Barista: Rise and Grind
description: RISE to the top in this cozy third-wave barista simulation game. GRIND to be the best barista by roasting, brewing and serving customers the best coffee possible. Buy equipment to unlock new recipes and customize your café’s layout, branding and decor to manage the business how you want!

name: Eleven Sunrises
description:
Eleven Sunrises is an open world exploration and survival RPG/Tower Defense.

Explore and conquer new territories. During this trip, you will find the food and weapons necessary for your survival.

name: Spread
description: Spread is a horror platformer with a unique 2D art style and a gripping storyline. Help Little Viny find her mother and escape from this creepy hotel...

name: Giant Worm Rider
description: Giant Worm Rider is a VR worm riding game with a retro aesthetic. Swing on the back of a giant worm and experience the immersive sci-fi setting in virtual reality.

name: Eidols
description: Eidols is a psychedelic survival game, set in an alien landscape. As you survive your creature will adapt to your actions, and as you die the life you lived will affect your future creatures. Features deep lore, a wide variety of different abilities, and multiplayer servers to explore it all on.

name: Right Nice Party
description: Right Nice Party is a playful, family-friendly and strategic party game with cheerful characters and a colorful world. Take over locations and build up your influence in the refreshingly new Conquest Mode and battle your friends in engaging mini-games between rounds!

name: No More Fathers
description: Set off on a high flying, exploration and puzzling adventure game. A journey set high above the clouds, in a mysterious world full of unexplored islands, dark spirits, caves, people with stories to share, and a boy looking for answers to the questions of a fatherless life, led by an ancient wind.

name: Polyhedron: Tales from Krasnoslavia
description: Polyhedron: tales from Krasnoslavia is a fast-paced FPS in an Eastern European cyberpunk setting. You are waiting for cool guns, lots of unique abilities, varied gameplay and much more.

name: North Frontier
description: North Frontier is an exciting real-time strategy game where you have to explore new lands, build cities in harsh conditions and develop them! Mine for minerals, build factories, institutes and get rewards for completing your plan!

name: Xel: Save the World Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Royal Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Noble Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Phoenix Point: Complete Edition
description: Phoenix Point: Complete Edition, the acclaimed strategy game from the creator of X-COM, is now assembled into the ultimate collection, including all DLCs, content updates, and product improvements over four years of development.

name: Circus Electrique: Deluxe Edition
description: Step right up to the Circus Electrique Deluxe Edition! Complete with thrilling digital bonus items: Original Soundtrack, Digital Artbook & Game Maps.

name: Witchcraft: The Lotus Elixir
description: Are you ready to meet your fate? Embark on an uncanny adventure as the Witch Apprentice in Witchcraft – The Lotus Elixir, a hidden object adventure that calls out your buried talents and magic.

name: Space Kabaam 3
description: Sin descripción

name: All in your head
description: You are left behind to spend the night in a cabin that was meant to be a destination launch party. The cabin is located in a beautiful & secluded hill of the country-side. But seclusion can also mean unchartered territories and paranormal activity.

name: All World Pro Wrestling: Bonus Stories 2
description: Get into those tight trunks and charge into the ring with three more smoking-hot stories of gay wrestling erotica! See the All World Pro Wrestling League at its best: gorgeous men, tight clinches, flexing muscles, and sexual tension in every move.

name: Almost My Floor: Duality
description: Almost My Floor: Duality - a noir detective horror-adventure game about the internal struggle with depression and the impending darkness in a provincial town. The gameplay is based on decision-making mechanics and a branching storyline.

name: Amber Island
description: Amber Island is an open world creature collector where you explore the wilderness to hunt and tame creatures. Anticipate and counter your opponent with defensive moves in strategic battles and tournaments. Explore new lands each filled with new challenges and creatures to collect and breed.

name: The Battles for Abunka
description: Sin descripción

name: Phantom Zone: Talon Fictions
description: Sin descripción

name: Wani Wani Attack
description: It will be a game to play with an air gun using ST32 and ST32R to be sold. Of course, you can also play with the mouse. Repel the crocodile attacking from the back of the bridge! Do not harm any creature other than the crocodile. Defeat a lot of crocodiles and get a high score.

name: Rise of the Ghostdom
description: Rise of the ghostdom is a medieval realistic open world game, the game uses the dialogue system to complete the exploration mission, in the combat system can bring you a different experience of the blow, the whole game gives you a realistic open world, you do not have to worry about doing the task,

name: Icarus Challenge
description: Fly around the beautiful island on your own and feel the free! To fly, you only have to spread your arms and flap. No need to use joy stick or keep looking in the direction of travel. If you can fly as you wish, let's challenge "Icarus challenge". It is simple. fly higher than anyone else!

name: Voidcrisis
description: Voidcrisis is a four-player tower offense game on an undulating battlefield. Operate combat bio-machines called VA (Vital Armor) drawn with dynamic mechanical art shaders and work together to clear high-difficulty stages.

name: Unknown
description: Darkness. Nothing. There’s no memory of what has become. All you have is a flashlight to navigate the horrors ahead of you. Use your wits to solve the puzzles and escape the levels of the dreaded facility. You don’t seem to be alone though…

name: Go Home
description: This is a match 3 game with a dog theme. The game has an innovative goal achievement system. There are also four other types of mini-games. In the game, you help the dog find its way home. Cute puppies are looking forward to your help.

name: Hidden in the Dark
description: You and your friends are going to spend a weekend at Amy's parents' vacation home. Mysteriously, they discover that there is a murderer in the house, and they need to act fast if they don't want to be caught. pronto

name: NoAmmo
description: You are a tanker who has run out of shells, your rifle has run out of bullets, you are wounded and powerless, but you must complete the task, so despite the crowds of enemy soldiers, you continue to move forward, transferring your coordinates to the base and praying for a victorious end!

name: Eternal Supreme
description: To save her people from the world destruction, the supreme tried to breakthrough to the legendary supreme realm but failed! She is coming back. In this fantasy world with various traces, you will explore the race origination, recover the prehistoric secrets, and become the most powerful supreme!

name: Planetoids
description: Planetoids is a 2D hand-drawn game that is a retro space arcade game. In it you have to shoot and dodge meteors, comets and wandering planets in outer space.

name: Avorion: Into the Rift
description: In this hardcore add-on for space sandbox Avorion you'll explore the mysterious and dangerous Rift Dimension, which is unlike anything you've ever seen in the galaxy. Face its dangers, complete research expeditions and earn powerful new rewards.

name: Spectre of Eternity
description: An action bullet hell. Dodge enemies attacks and collect upgrades to make it to the end of each level.

name: The Legend of Heroes in the Jianghu
description: The legend of heroes in the Jianghu is a martial arts open world role-playing game.

name: Champs TD
description: Champs TD is a Tower Defense Game with endless replayability. Slay thousands of Minions in randomized Waves. Summon powerful Champions with 28+ unique Abilities. Earn Experience, Level Up and choose from 100+ Talents to improve your Champs just the way you want.

name: Gamer Girls: Futanari
description: Gamer Girls: Futanari is a classic visual novel and casual puzzle game with and beautiful sexy scenes. You need to match blocks to pass level.After each passed level you gonna be surprised with unique sex scenes with our girls!All characters in this game are over the age of 18

name: Fantasy Hentai Quest
description: Run and Jump in this 2d Platformer with top notch graphics and uncover a surprising narrative written in a innovative text light system.

name: Mission: Driver
description: Start the engine and become a legendary driver! Control a variety of unique vehicles with realistic driving physics. Master dozens of challenging missions and break all the records!

name: Logic Circuit: Marble Puzzle
description: Marble Puzzle to spend time, where you must fulfill up to 60 challenges! Move the pieces to create a path and get the metal marbles to reach the base of the board, you must make each of the bases fall a corresponding number of marbles.

name: Escapers
description: Escapers is co-op, puzzle escaping game. Your only goal is to get away!

name: Lua
description: Join Lua in this adventure that combines downhill and fantasy. Dive into epic descents and take challenging corners using the magical power of root-shooting. Help Lua face her fears while riding downhill on a longboard through the mountains.

name: CRT7
description: CRT7 is an experimental music-puzzle game. Place pentominoes, play music, generate power, repeat. The more you play, the more strange devices you unlock, allowing you to solve escape-room style puzzles to explore further. What secrets are hiding in the dark?

name: Meliora
description: A local multiplayer tactical RPG board game, introducing 16 characters with unique passive and active skills, different game modes, a free for all or tag teams, save yourself or defeat your enemies, and build different strategies to claim your victory.

name: GG Land
description: GG Land is a place where all kinds of games meet together. And it also has a built-in game building tool! With this tool, you can create your own game in minutes without knowing anything about code or design!

name: Planetary Defense: An Orbital Turret Defense System
description: 2D space shooter and turret defense come together to create the Planetary Defense this world needs! Shoot down asteroids and aliens and survive the bosses in this arcade like game featuring custom built satellites, projectiles and upgradable Cannon and Planet Shield

name: Mad Trapper
description: In this Simulation of an Arcade Survival you can trap, hunt and explore, of course be on the look out for crazy critters, because they will be looking for you!

name: Skeleton King
description: A role-playing nonlinear game. 1. Tomb robbing: obtain bones. 2. Summon: resurrect bones. 3. Battle: PK between players' skeletons. 4. Market: free trading skeleton. 5. Occupy: occupy the altar of soul power, absorb soul power alone, and upgrade bones.

name: Cold Way
description: “Cold Way” is amazing pixel adventure where you have to travel through the cold and snowy world.

name: Mechanic Mechanica
description:
It's an action fighting game where you are able to customize your mech, similar in content to Custom Robo.

A prototype cartridge was found in 2021.

name: Tokyo Stories
description: The city continues to tell her story, even after her disappearance.

name: Hera: The Sword of Rhin
description: Sin descripción

name: Abenteuer auf dem Reiterhof: Sonderedition
description: In this game you take on the role of Annie and your ultimate goal is to win the Kingswood Championship! Of course, before you can succeed, there is a lot for you to do! In addition to the training and many things to discover, the most important task is to take care of your horse. Because if you manage to win the championship, a real surprise is waiting for you!

name: Dee Dee Planet
description: Dee Dee Planet was intended to follow ChuChu Rocket! as part of a series of Dreamcast network games, but was cancelled last minute. Lost for two decades, the final beta has been found and dumped online for you all to enjoy!
